title: Looking for girl gamers to play with  ?? is there anyout there ??  add me
body:
Hi im a dude my parnter who is a chick is wondering if there are any girls, mature friendly an fun to play LOL with no serious people just fun cheers 
 
add vforwhai

Thanks

replies.body: The level of desperation coming from this guy is too dam high

"is there anyone out there"

Can't help but eyeroll that one :/

the only people we play with are guys she wanted more girls that play lol with, not that desperate to ask mate your either ganna get a yes or a no an this post was ment for my parnter "vforwhai " who is female . thanks for your awsome comment :)
Why did you play her promo series for her?
cause i was bored # no serious people please !
nah mate no desperation we both work we both play why is it desperate to want a bigger pool of friends to play with ??
Gg the guy actually added me and said dont make him look like a clown lool dont go asking for "girl gamers" next time then maybe people wont give you stick for sounding like a desperate dog

please make sense when you speak lol i said your the clown you posted that comment lol dog ??
you serious da fuq fuk up your arse grow up mate this was for my parnter not me. added you to see your profile 
#so silver 
#angry lil elo

Hmmm she also told me she didn't want to play with you are your friends because you "rage" at her.
Judging off the way to start to swear at people here it's not a surprise.
Just a suggestion but if you work on your anger issues maybe your girlfriend will enjoy playing with you and will not seek other to play with. 

Also why does she need females?
Tell her to play on her own for a while and meet people through the game.
Not all guys will rage as much as you, no need to turn her off men completely.
we have been playing for 3 years lol been married for 5 get it right she said me an my mates rage ( as in loud)

this annit even about me you either want to play with her or dont simple no need to make it a bigg thing if we have disrupted your time sorry in advance as i said we she wanted to expand her friend pool our friends dont play lol this post is just gone the wrong way .

is it a crime for her to wanna play with other girls ?? an skyprus i dont rage hun im just loud very fukn loud

I don't understand how I have been "loud" since you have refined rage as that...?
I have no problem with her wishing to play with other girls, you just have a very aggressive attitude which I feel you should work on.
im loud not you an this isnt about me wtf lol hahahah
I find it amusing that you went to the boards for this. There are girl gamers around (yes, I'm proof because I'm one of them :D) League of Legends, you just have to be willing to look.
thanks :)

pretty similar to social network thought this was a community to reach out ? am i wrong or have people sought this website out to negate other peoples preference i mean we play alot but i guess your right in sense of us asking in game if there are girls present in game we only play for fun so ultimatly was just asking for her if there was any other who felt the same XD guess we just look stupid but was worth a shot :D cheers for your comment

**Haiii**

I added her, Thanks. It's nice to know that more chilled out girl gamers on the OCE community :3

P.S why are people fighting over this? XD
Get a life.
:) thanks for your comment
hay if you have nothing nice to say simple to comment mature fun people ONLY im a dude vforwhai is a chick get it "desperate" no just expanding our pool of people to play with  thank you :)
Did someone say grill? WHERE?
I'm a G.I.R.L does that count?
I added because I'm a G.I.R.L, so why not you.
